project.description: The project aims to provide an infrastructure that will facilitate research efforts by integrating data collection, data processing in large-scale infrastructures, and dissemination of results. In order to evaluate software quality, data from Free/Libre/Open Source Software (FLOSS) projects will be used. Such an infrastructure will consist of: 1) Software, enabling researchers to develop and run experiments efficiently on large data volumes, along with a collection of readily available data processing, curating and analysis methods 2) Pre-processed data, from FLOSS projects, in a form that is suitable for analysis 3) A cloud based computation infrastructure, suitable for mass data processing.
